entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a student who is laughing openly and making fun of Harry Potter. He is described as leering and backing away from Harry.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character who is being teased by Malfoy. He is described as wanting to cause Malfoy pain.

entities.name: madam hooch
entities.description: Madam Hooch is a teacher who is still berating Crabbe for his illegal Bludger attack.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is a student who has committed an illegal Bludger attack and is being scolded by Madam Hooch.

entities.name: george weasley
entities.description: George Weasley is Harry's friend who is also involved in the altercation with Malfoy.

relationships.description: Harry Potter attacks Malfoy by punching him in the stomach.
George Weasley also attacks Malfoy, but it is not clear if he uses a wand or his fists.
